Key: (Sorry, Kotori. I'll call you back later.)

(I'm putting Origami first. I promised
her I'd be there forever.)

(Our war has just begun! I'm going to win,
and help her... reclaim lost time. Her smile,
her heart. I'm going to restore them!)
Are you sure about that?

Yeah! She probably wants to bring up dinner
or small talk.
I see. I'm glad.
Huh?
I don't think I could wait any longer.

(This is how Origami and I began life as a
couple.)

(People change. Relationships, heartbreak,
everything...)

(No matter what obstacles life threw at us,
we learned to heal. I know it to be true.)

(Of course. You can't let life pass you by.
Sometimes, you need to confront your demons.)

(The Spirits continued to trouble us. However,
we learned to live with them.)

(The biggest change came when Origami
resigned from AST. I asked if she was sure,
but she fell into my arms, crying.)

(It was as if the heavens shattered, as rain
began to pour. Origami cried and cried and
cried. All of her emotions rushed forth.)

(She told me her hatred never truly left her.
Nor could she fully escape her tortured past.)

(But... She has me. Someone who will remain
at her side forever. That's all she needs.)

(I nodded and hugged Origami with as much
kindness as she wanted, then I looked her
in the eye.)
Oh, it moved. Origami, it just moved.
So energetic. Like someone I know.
Y-Yeah. I know!

I hope it's got some spunk. This is the
proof of our love.
Yes. I hope so, too.
Hehe...
(At last, our private war had ended.)

(Now, a new era will begin with this
soon-to-be-named life.)

(An era that could take up the rest of our
lives, protecting what's dear to us.)

Oh, we need to think of a name soon.
Got any ideas, Origami?
Yes. Our child's name will be...
